  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

  • Method Details

    • addKeyBind

      public static void addKeyBind(String control, int keyCode)
      Binds the specified key to the named control.

      More accurately, makes it so that if the specified key is pressed, the named control will be added to the lists for controlDown(String) and controlPressed(String)
      Parameters:
      control - The control to add to the key
      keyCode - The key code of the key to bind

    • removeKeyBind

      public static void removeKeyBind(String control, int keyCode)
      Removes the named control from the specified key
      Parameters:
      control - The control to remove from the key
      keyCode - The key code of the key to unbind

    • clearKeyBindings

      public static void clearKeyBindings()
      Removes all key bindings (including defaults)

    • printKeyBinds

      public static void printKeyBinds()
      Displays all current key bindings
      See Also:
      • printKeyBinds(boolean)

    • printKeyBinds

      public static void printKeyBinds(boolean sortByBind)
      Displays all current key bindings, sorted by bindings if specified, else sorted by keys
      Parameters:
      sortByBind - whether to sort by bindings

    • keyDown

      public static boolean keyDown(int keyCode)
      Returns whether the key corresponding to the specified key code is currently down. This returns true as long as the key is down.

      Note: This checks all keys, not just those with assigned controls
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The key code to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified key is down
      See Also:
      • keyPressed(int)
      • controlDown(String)

    • keyPressed

      public static boolean keyPressed(int keyCode)
      Returns whether the key corresponding to the specified key code was pressed since the last refresh. This returns true as long as the key is down.

      Note: This checks all keys, not just those with assigned controls
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The key code to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified key has been pressed
      See Also:
      • keyDown(int)
      • controlPressed(String)

    • mouseButtonDown

      public static boolean mouseButtonDown(int button)
      Returns whether the specified mouse button is currently down. This returns true as long as the button is down.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified button is down
      See Also:
      • mouseButtonPressed(int)

    • mouseButtonPressed

      public static boolean mouseButtonPressed(int button)
      Returns whether the specified mouse button is currently down. This returns true only once per press of a given button.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to check
      Returns:
      Whether the specified button has been pressed
      See Also:
      • mouseButtonDown(int)

    • controlDown

      public static boolean controlDown(String control)
      Returns whether the specified control is currently being held. This returns true as long as the key is down.
      Parameters:
      control - The name of the control to check
      Returns:
      Whether the named control is being held
      See Also:
      • to register controls
      • controlPressed(String)
      • keyDown(int)

    • controlPressed

      public static boolean controlPressed(String control)
      Returns whether the specified control was pressed since the last refresh. This returns true only once per press of a given key.
      Parameters:
      control - The name of the control to check
      Returns:
      Whether the named control has been pressed
      See Also:
      • to register controls
      • controlDown(String)
      • keyPressed(int)

    • getMouse

      public static Point getMouse()
      Returns the current position of the mouse.

      Note: This position is relative to the source window, use World.convertToWorldCoordinates(Point) to get the point relative to the world.
      Returns:
      the current position of the mouse

    • getMouseMovement

      public static Point getMouseMovement()
      Returns a Point representing the change in position of the mouse since the last update
      Returns:
      A Point representing the movement of the mouse
